name: Butchery
description:
This is a psychological atmospheric game.   A family consisting of three rabbits ended up inside a box and was transported to an old seemingly abandoned villa. Your goal will be to help escape from the treacherous captivity by making your way to the forest. 

This is the injection site, how it itches, but the pain fades before what can happen if you don't escape. The barking of watchdogs does not bode well. Who knows, maybe on the way to the forest it will become clear why we were brought to this gloomy sinister place. I'm going first, Mary you're after me, Ron you're the last. 

Take your time, be quiet and don't forget about the secluded places where the dogs won't get us.
